gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 111, Magic 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Magic, 111-97. Tyrese Haliburton recorded 20 points, seven rebounds and eight assists for the Pacers, while Pascal Siakam added 20 points, seven rebounds and three assists in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 19 points, five rebounds and five assists for the Magic in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 36-29 on the season, while the Magic fall to 37-28.
